answerText: Kerguelen Islands [or Desolation Islands; or Archipel des Kerguelen; or Îles Kerguelen][10] The Kerguelen Islands are owned by this country, whose other Indian Ocean possessions include Réunion and Mayotte. It also owns Guadeloupe and Martinique as well as a region east of Suriname.
heading: Penn Bowl |2013 | 1 | 18 | Geography | None | College
subject: Geography
question: Question: This archipelago was the destination of the most observation teams sent to the Indian Ocean to observe the 1874 Transit of Venus. For 10 points each: [10] Name this archipelago in the Southern Indian Ocean, which lies on a namesake underwater plateau and whose largest island is La Grande Terre.
